midas/examples/hbookexpt/adccalib.c

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 /********************************************************************\
00002 
00003   Name:         adccalib.c
00004   Created by:   Stefan Ritt
00005 
00006   Contents:     Example analyzer module for ADC calibration. Looks
00007                 for ADC0 bank, subtracts pedestals and applies gain
00008                 calibration. The resulting values are appended to 
00009                 the event as an CADC bank ("calibrated ADC"). The
00010                 pedestal values and software gains are stored in
00011                 adccalib_param structure which was defined in the ODB
00012                 and transferred to experim.h.
00013 
00014   $Log: adccalib.c,v $
00015   Revision 1.1.1.1  2005/06/20 23:37:11  mucap
00016   Importing release 1.9.5 of the MIDAS source code as distributed by PSI.
00017   (Next, I'll commit our local customizations.)
00018 
00019   Revision 1.2  2004/01/08 08:40:09  midas
00020   Implemented standard indentation
00021 
00022   Revision 1.1  2003/04/25 13:20:07  midas
00023   Initial revision
00024 
00025   
00026 \********************************************************************/
00027

00035 #include "midas.h"

00049 #include <hbook.h>

00054 extern EXP_PARAM exp_param;
00055 extern RUNINFO runinfo;

00066 ANA_MODULE adc_calib_module = {
00067    "ADC calibration",           /* module name           */
00068    "Stefan Ritt",               /* author                */
00069    adc_calib,                   /* event routine         */
00070    adc_calib_bor,               /* BOR routine           */

00073    NULL,                        /* exit routine          */
00074    &adccalib_param,             /* parameter structure   */
00075    sizeof(adccalib_param),      /* structure size        */
00076    adc_calibration_param_str,   /* initial parameters    */
00077 };

00087 /*-- init routine --------------------------------------------------*/
00088 
00089 #define ADC_N_BINS   500
00090 #define ADC_X_LOW      0
00091 #define ADC_X_HIGH  4000
00092 
00093 INT adc_calib_init(void)
00094 {
00095    char name[256];
00096    int i;
00097 
00098    /* book CADC histos */
00099    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++) {
00100       sprintf(name, "CADC%02d", i);
00101       HBOOK1(ADCCALIB_ID_BASE + i, name, ADC_N_BINS,
00102              (float) ADC_X_LOW, (float) ADC_X_HIGH, 0.f);
00103    }
00104 
00105    return SUCCESS;
00106 }
00107 
00108 /*-- BOR routine ---------------------------------------------------*/
00109 
00110 INT adc_calib_bor(INT run_number)
00111 {
00112    return SUCCESS;
00113 }
00114 
00115 /*-- eor routine ---------------------------------------------------*/
00116 
00117 INT adc_calib_eor(INT run_number)
00118 {
00119    return SUCCESS;
00120 }
00121 
00122 /*-- event routine -------------------------------------------------*/
00123 
00124 INT adc_calib(EVENT_HEADER * pheader, void *pevent)
00125 {
00126    INT i;
00127    WORD *pdata;
00128    float *cadc;
00129 
00130    /* look for ADC0 bank, return if not present */
00131    if (!bk_locate(pevent, "ADC0", &pdata))
00132       return 1;
00133 
00134    /* create calibrated ADC bank */
00135    bk_create(pevent, "CADC", TID_FLOAT, &cadc);
00136 
00137    /* zero cadc bank */
00138    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++)
00139       cadc[i] = 0.f;
00140 
00141    /* subtract pedestal */
00142    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++)
00143       cadc[i] = (float) ((double) pdata[i] - adccalib_param.pedestal[i] + 0.5);
00144 
00145    /* apply software gain calibration */
00146    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++)
00147       cadc[i] *= adccalib_param.software_gain[i];
00148 
00149    /* fill ADC histos if above threshold */
00150 
00151    for (i = 0; i < N_ADC; i++)
00152       if (cadc[i] > (float) adccalib_param.histo_threshold)
00153          HF1(ADCCALIB_ID_BASE + i, cadc[i], 1.f);
00154 
00155    /* close calculated bank */
00156    bk_close(pevent, cadc + N_ADC);
00157 
00158    return SUCCESS;
00159 }
